Stacy suddenly felt a cramping in her hands, then her face, and doubled over- not in pain, but disoriented, she quickly excused herself and laid down in Jessica's bedroom. She felt a sudden panic as the colors of the world seemed to fade, into a crisp black and white. It felt, suddenly, as if she itched everywhere, and her head felt as if someone had put it into a vise and was closing it, squeezing her suddenly plastic bones and forcing the front of her skull out- she could see her nose, seeming to push out, and her mouth and jaw carrying it into a pointed snout.

"Wow, what was in that drink?" Stacy asked herself as she passed out on the bed.

A while later, Stacy woke from her slumber.

She tried to stand, but her legs wouldn’t work- they seemed to be shorter, and the jeans she’d been wearing seemed like a tent, and the blouse was impossibly loose. Stacy struggled to get out of it, feeling and hearing the soft fabric tear, and then as panic set in felt a warm moistness at her crotch- she’d urinated from fear. Disgusted with herself, she thrashed at the jeans and blouse, and stumbled toward the hall, crawling on all fours.

"What’s wrong with me? Why can’t I… oh, shit." Stacy said.

A beagle looked back at her from the hall mirror- still wearing the shreds of a white blouse, she’d managed to wiggle out of the soaked jeans, but the underwear she had on was still around her canine rump, held on by her tail. Her bra still hung around her, slid back now to her waist.

Ignoring her, Amanda gestured, and Cynthia's clothing vanished, instantly replaced by a maid outfit. Her long, black tied itself into a bun.

Before Cynthia could say anything, Amanda spoke again.

"Of course, I can't take you like that, people would accuse me of violating the child labor laws!"

She gestured again, and Cynthia began to age and grow, (fortunately, her clothes grew with her), stopping when she was a pretty, busty eighteen year-old, looking so hot that any otaku worthy of the name would have had a veritable Niagara of a nosebleed.

"What have you done to me?" said Cynthia, in shock.

"Smile, dear", said Amanda, "I like my servants to look happy!" Cynthia's lips drew back into a wide grin, frozen in place on her face.

"Now, keep still", said Amanda. Cynthia stood to attention, her arms at her sides, unable to move.

"Now to get you ready to travel", said Amanda. She drew up her right sleeve, to reveal a charm bracelet on her right wrist. The "charms" appeared to be small figures of men and women. Amanda held the bracelet over Cynthia's head. A small ring materialized, linking the bracelet to the top of Cynthia's head. Cynthia began to shrink. As she shrank, her body took on a golden hue. Within a few seconds, she was just another "charm" on Amanda's bracelet.

"Now to clean up" said Amanda, She gestured, and all of the girls' clothing, whether still on their bodies or scattered around the house, turned to dust and blew away. She waved her hand, and a dog carrier appeared in her hand. she set it down on the kitchen floor. Without warning, it swelled up and around the sixteen dog-girl, trapping them inside itself, before shrinking back to its original size. Amanda picked up the dog carrier and walked out the back door of the house.

Inside the carrier, the dog/girls found themselves in a dark but comfortable space. There was a faint light coming from the door of the carrier. June tried to open the door , but it was firmly latched.

Wow, thought Sandy. This thing is bigger on the inside, like a TARDIS*.


Never mind that, thought Stephanie. What's going on? Who is this Amanda? Why is this happening to us?


*Stands for "Time And Relative Dimension In Space".
11123222222211111111.title: Amanda

111232222222111111111.content:
Suddenly, the dog/girls heard Amanda's voice in answer, as though she were right in the dog carrier with them.

"I'm in a good mood right now, so I'll give you some exposition. As you may perhaps have guessed. I'm what you might call a sorceress. Yes, magic is real, although your world doesn't seem to have an native magic-users. As for why I transformed you all into dogs, well, humans that have been transformed into animals are high-demand luxury items in some realities. Of course, it's hugely illegal in all the civilized worlds to transform people against their will, so that's why I like to raid realities like yours. where there's no one who will detect magic in use. Anyway, there are people who are willing to pay high prices for transformed humans, and who aren't too particular whether they were volunteers or not."

Why us, though?, thought June.

"Oh, my - 'fence', I think you would call him - placed an order for sixteen young girls who had been transformed into different breeds of dogs. No idea what he wants you for - pets, familiars, breeding animals, who knows?"


"Breeding animals"?, thought Caroline.

"Possibly", said Amanda. "I don't ask. Don't worry too much. Even I have my standards. I would never sell you to someone who might eat you or sacrifice you, or even abuse you. Also, to save you some time and effort, I'll tell you now: The spell I used on you can't be reversed. Even I couldn't do it, if I wanted to. And you can't be further transformed. You're dogs for the rest of your lives, so get used to it."

Why us, particularly?, thought Sandy.

And why did you pose as a babysitter?, asked Stacy.

"No especial reason", said Amanda. "I could have just taken sixteen girls at random, but I like to have fun on these jobs when I can, and Stacy and her parents were easily manipulated. Seriously, Stacy, did it never occur to you to wonder why someone who had been hired to watch you just let you go off to a party without saying a word? It was just gravy that there were all the girls I needed at the party, with a spare to take as a souvenir."

But what about our families?, thought Violet. We'll be missed!

"No, you won't, actually", said Amanda. "The spell I used re-wrote people's memories, changed all records and transformed any personal items. No one will remember you, and there's no evidence left that you existed. It's not as thorough as re-writing history, and any first-year magic-user would spot it instantly, but it'll do for a world like yours."

What have you done to my sister?, asked Jessica.

"Cynthia? She's one of my slaves, now. I always keep a few of them in 'charm' form when I travel in case I need them. When I get her home, I'll restore her to her new human form, and set her to work. Don't worry - I've brainwashed her so that she'll be overjoyed to be my slave and truly believe that a life serving me is the best possible life imaginable. Also, I've stopped her aging, so that she'll be physically eighteen forever. You should be happy for her - she'll be eternally young and beautiful, doing work that she finds rich and fulfilling.for as long as she lives, which may well be as long as I live, which may well be forever. Hush now, I've got to concentrate, I've got to cast a 'travel' spell."

Amanda was bringing them...

Do not upset master or else she could hurt you. More thoughts flowed in her mind and soon she felt a prickly feeling on her skin. She looked at her body pretty closely, and saw hair, fur actually, grow all over her body. It wasn't too painful, but the sensation made her instinctively raise her leg. The leg followed through and soon enough, she was scratching her body just like a normal dog would. As the fur was growing Stacy noticed that her beautiful dirty blonde hair was changing to what her vision precepted as grayish yellow. A whimper burst through as she tried to scream. Amanda finally came over as the final changes occurred, knowing that Stacy was too preoccupied with all the changes. In her hand, Amanda held firmly onto a pink collar with the name tag labeled Stacy. The whimpering and crying Stacy settled down instantly for a while as she felt giant hands pick her up. Stacy looked at the one who had held her, and saw Amanda, but instead of growling, Stacy started panting happily and wagged her tail. In the back of Stacy's mind, she was screaming. "C'mon body work!!! That is the one who did this to you!!" The problem, though, was that wasn't the only voice in her mind, and the other voice was more powerful.Master!!! I love you so much!! It seemed like the other voice was motivating Stacy to do things that her human part would never dream of. Amanda smiled and even giggled as Stacy suddenly began licking her cheek. "I love you too Stacey!! You're gonna be a good girl for me right?" Stacy's human voice shouted "NOOOOO!!!! I will never ever treat you with respect!" But of course, it was overpowered with Yes!!!! Yes Master!!! I love to obey you!!

1131322.content:
Amanda set Stacy's bowl on the floor.

"Dinner is served" the babysitter said.

"Ha ha, very funny. I'm not eating my meatloaf out of a bowl on the floor."

Amanda laughed to herself. She had opened a can of dog food and put it in the bowl, but the spell effecting Stacy must be making her think the dog food is meat loaf. Amanda decided to keep track of how Stacy's mind interpreted the reality around her to use as a measure of how much her mind was accepting the coming changes.

"Well, if you don't want that 'meatloaf' I guess I'll throw it out" Amanda said.

Stacy noticed Amanda put heavy emphasis on the word meatloaf, but didn't have time to worry about that. Her stomach was positively growling.

"No, don't do that. Can I just have a plate and silverware please?" she asked, surprisingly meekly for the stuck up girl.

"Look Stacy, I don't have time for games. I assume you don't want to go hungry. Just eat your dinner."

Stacy stared at the bowl of meatloaf. If she wasn't overwhelmed with hunger, she might have noticed how cloudy her mind felt. That cloudiness made it hard to pay attention to Amanda, until she heard her say 'Just eat your dinner.' The command seemed to cut through the fog in Stacy's mind. When Amanda gave her a command, Stacy's brain immediately interpreted that idea as if it had been her own. She was very hungry, after all. I should just eat my dinner, she thought. As soon as Stacy thought this, her stomach growled again, echoing its support. She was so focused on her hunger and the food, Stacy didn't even notice herself get down on her hands and knees. The next thing she knew, she was sticking her face into the bowl and taking a big bite.

The taste was amazing! Stacy couldn't remember meatloaf ever tasting this good! Although it was a stronger, muskier flavor than she remembered, that seemed to be just what she wanted. She also noticed it was moister than meatloaf usually was, but that didn't stop her from taking bite after bite, until finally, it was all gone. She was so focused on the flavor and sating her hunger, she didn't even notice that as she ate more, she got more excited, and ended up smearing some of the food on her face.

"Well, guess you didn't need a plate after all" Amanda said grinning.

When she heard Amanda's voice, Stacy's mind lost a little bit of the fog. And with the fog gone, she realized she had just eaten an entire meatloaf out of a bowl on the ground like an animal. She was deeply embarrassed by her actions, and even worse, that she had done so in front of her babysitter! She blushed a deep red and looked at Amanda.
1131322.title: It turns out the "meatloaf" is really d...

choices: Stacy remembers wanting to confront Amanda about something
11313222.content:
Stacy was mortified. "Please don't tell mom and dad how I ate my meatloaf, okay? I don't know what came over me."

Amanda chuckled. "Oh, I don't think it's the meatloaf they'll have questions about..."

Stacy looked confusedly at Amanda. What did she mean by that? Then she looked back at the bowl. There was a smear or two of food left. Wait a minute, meatloaf didn't smear did it? And she still couldn't get over how strong it tasted. That musky, meaty taste still felt strong in Stacy's mouth. As she considered this, her gaze moved up from the bowl on the floor to the counter next to Amanda. Stacy's blood ran cold.

"No way.... I didn't...."

Stacy could only stare in shock. Sitting on the counter next to Amanda was a can opener and an open, and empty, can of dog food!

"I'm afraid so Stacy. You just scarfed down a whole can of Purina's finest!"

"But.. no! You are just playing a trick on me! You just dumped that can out before I came in here, I'd know if I ate dog food!"

Amanda smirked. "Oh really? Here, have a whiff of this and tell me that isn't what you just ate so happily." Amanda grabbed the empty can and held it in front of Stacy's face.

Stacy tentatively took a sniff. As soon as she did, there was no doubt. That scent smelled exactly like the taste coating her tongue right this very second!

"Oh gross!" Stacy yelled. She blushed a deep red. She really had done it! She had eaten dog food! What was wrong with her. Her shame was too much, she had to get away. Stacy turned from Amanda and ran to her bathroom. Inside, she slammed the door and went straight to her sink. Her mouth tasted like dog food! She had to take care of that NOW! She popped the lid off her mouthwash and took a long swig. After rinsing it around her mouth, she spit it out, then repeated the process twice more. The mint aftertaste was finally strong enough that it overpowered anything else.

Stacy started to cry. She was so embarrassed. How could she have eaten dog food? And what was worse, why was there a voice in the back of her mind saying how good it tasted?! What if her family or friends had seen her? She'd never live down her freak status! And that no good Amanda had made her do it. She was going to show her. She stopped crying as she became more angry at Amanda. It was time to take her down. She wiped her tears away and checked herself in the mirror. She blushed a deep crimson again as she noticed a bit of smeared dog food on her face. She quickly grabbed a washcloth and cleaned the offending evidence off her face. That woman was going to pay for this.

Stacy opened the bathroom door and stomped back into the kitchen. Amanda was still standing by the counter, looking like the cat who ate the canary.

"I don't know what you did, but you're going to pay for that. I'm calling my parents right now!" Stacy yelled.

Amanda muttered something under her breath she couldn't hear. Stacy suddenly felt confused, as though she had just woken from a dream. All her anger drained out of her. She could barely remember how she got into the kitchen, much less what she was doing there.

"Was there something you needed?" Amanda asked.

Stacy tried to think. Was there something on he mind?
11313222.title: Amanda shows Stacy what she really just ate

113132222.content:
"Was there something you needed?" Amanda asked.

Stacy felt in a daze. What was it she came in here to do? For the life of her, she couldn't remember. It was like she had just woken from a really good nap, and her mind hadn't quite kicked into gear yet. As she thought, Amanda noticed Stacy was unconsciously fidgeting and bending her legs.

"Ummm.... I don't remember," Stacy admitted. She didn't realize it, but at this point she was practically hopping from foot to foot. To any parent, Stacy was unmistakably doing the "pee-pee dance."

"Well, looks like someone needs to use the toilet if I'm not mistaken" Amanda said with a devious grin.

Stacy was about to retort when her body's signals finally got through the haze and she realized Amanda was right. She had to pee bad! She turned around and quickly walked back to the bathroom. Once inside, she shut the door, but as soon as the door latched, she felt her mind cloud up again. It was like thinking through a thick soup. Why had she come in here? After a second, she felt her body's need, and remembered she had to pee. But her mind was so thick, it was hard for her to put together her need to go with what to do next. She looked at the toilet. Was that what she needed?

Even though Stacy had been using a toilet for years, her mind was having trouble processing what it was there for. She opened the lid and looked down. She was almost mesmerized by the water in the bowl. That water looked so clear and refreshing. Yes, she thought, water is refreshing. I must be thirsty. She went to the sink and filled a glass with water from the tap, then drank the whole thing. As she put the glass down, she felt the pressure in her bladder grow. That's right, she thought, I have to pee. Again, her mind was barely responding. She walked back to the toilet. I have to pee, she thought. What was the next step? She looked at the toilet. As soon as she saw the water in the bowl, all she could think about was how refreshing it looked. That's right, she thought, water is very refreshing. Again, she left the toilet and filled up another glass, drinking the entire thing. This time it only took a second for her bladder to tell her she was running out of time. But for the life of her, she couldn't think of what to do. Suddenly there was a knock on the door.

"Is everything alright in there?" Amanda asked. "Do you need any help?"

How did Stacy respond?
113132222.title: Stacy forgots and is distracted

choices: Keep pounding on the door and pleading with Amanda
No choice, time's up, use a tree
1131322222.content:
Stacy was deeply embarrassed, but she knew if she didn't go soon she was going to have an accident.

"Please Amanda, I need some help."

Amanda opened the bathroom door.

"Then come out here, I'll help."

Stacy was confused. She needed to go to the bathroom, so why should she leave? But before she could ask, Amanda walked off. Stacy had no choice but to follow her. She walked out to the living room, to where Amanda was standing by the sliding door to the fenced in back yard.

"Now, what seems to be the problem?"

"Amanda..." Stacy whined "I need to go to the bathroom!" Stacy was dancing back and forth, doing the pee pee dance again.

"Then why don't you?" Amanda asked.

"I don't know! Every time I try I get... confused... or something... Please, I really have to go, help me!" Stacy was very ashamed to ask for help in something so routine, but she knew something was wrong. She'd worry about what after she got this taken care of. Amanda just shook her head and opened the sliding door.

"If you're just going to waste my time with practical jokes, I'm going out back." Amanda walked outside. Stacy hopped out after her.

"Pleeeeeeease! It's not a joke. Something's really wrong, but I don't know how to go to the bathroom! I need help." Stacy whined. She couldn't hold it much more.

Amanda folded her arms across her chest, taking a serious tone. "Fine, but to prove you're not pulling my leg, you'll have to do something for me. Take off your pants."

"What?" Stacy asked. She couldn't be serious? Although her thoughts were foggy, Amanda's command echoed in her mind like it was her own thought. However, that thought was so alien, that it didn't make sense to Stacy, so she managed to brush it aside.

"I'm serious. I need you to prove to me you aren't faking. If you do it, I'll know you're serious. Take off your pants."

The second time Stacy heard the command, she felt it even strong inside her brain. I should take off my pants, she thought. I need to prove I'm not faking to Amanda. Although she didn't like the idea, it seemed logical to her. She quickly undid the buttons and slipped out of her jeans. Amanda held out her hand, and Stacy handed them over. She put her hands down to cover up her panties.

"Panties too. Take them off."

Stacy was intensely embarrassed. Now Amanda wanted her to take off her panties too? But then Stacy's mind caught the command, and suddenly Stacy thought she needed to take off her panties. She quickly pulled her white cotton panties down to her ankles, then stepped one foot, then the other, out of them. She picked them up and handed them to Amanda.

As soon as Amanda received the panties, she pushed Stacy to the ground. As Stacy got up, Amanda ran back inside and closed the door, locking it.

"Hey! I need to pee! What are you doing?!" Stacy said, trying not to be too loud to get any neighbor's attention. Right now she was thanking her parents for building the 8 foot privacy wall around their back yard.

"I'm helping you. There's plenty of trees out there, just go by one and then you can come back in."

What should Stacy do?
1131322222.title: I need help

11313222222.content:
Stacy realized with a sinking feeling that she'd been tricked. And the spasm of pain from her bladder told her that her time was up. She had no choice. She quickly walked over to a tree as far away from the house as possible. Blushing deeply, she crept around the back of the tree, away from the door. She might not have much privacy, but it was the least she could do to be mostly out of view of Amanda. There she squatted down. The act of squatting was enough to break her hold on her bladder, and she immediately began peeing.

Stacy had never felt more embarrassed in her entire life. She thought eating dog food had been her worst moment, but this was worse. Here she was, an eighteen year old girl, and she was peeing on a tree in her yard. She was a cheerleader, for pete's sake! She was supposed to be the top of the social strata, desired by everyone. But if anyone had seen her now, all they would see is a blushing girl with just a shirt on peeing in the back yard. She tried to fight back the tears, but it was too traumatic, and she started crying. She also realized just how much she had to go when she kept peeing. It took her only about forty five seconds total, but it seemed like hours. She felt as though the whole world could see her shame. Finally, she was finished. But now she realized she had no toilet paper. She took two steps forward and squatted all the way down, patting her crotch dry on the grass. Then she stood up. She stopped crying. She wouldn't give Amanda the satisfaction. She walked back to the screen door, naked from the waste down. So much for her dignity.

Amanda stood just inside the glass with a warm smile on her face. Stacy was learning to hate it when that woman smiled.

"There, now, that wasn't so bad. I bet you feel better now don't you?"

Stacy just glared evil daggers at the woman.

"Are you going to let me back in?"

"Of course, as soon as you do one more thing."

"What?! Let me in now!" Stacy practically yelled.

"Oh, that's no way to treat the one on this side of the door" Amanda said mockingly.

"Fine. What more do you want?"

"I'll let you in if you bark like a dog for me."

"What?! Are you crazy!? No way I'm doing that!"

"Fine, then you can stay out there."

Stacy tried pulling on the door, but it was no good, it was locked tight. Amanda walked over and pulled up a chair and sat by the door. Stacy refused to give in, but Amanda obviously wasn't budging either. She got out a book and started reading.

"Please, let me in!" Stacy whined.

"You know what you have to do" was all Amanda would say, then she proceeded to ignore Stacy.

Stacy fumed and huffed. She wouldn't break! She walked over and sat down in the grass. She was bored and embarrassed, but she wasn't going to bark! After about fifteen minutes, Stacy heard a familiar sound of a car driving up the driveway next door. Oh no! The neighbors were home. Although there was the privacy fence, it was just wooden fence posts. There were small spaces between each post, so if you got right next to the fence, you could see through. There wasn't any reason for the neighbors to do so, but Stacy was so embarrassed she was worried they would anyway. She got up and ran do the door.

"Please! Please!" she pleaded. Amanda just looked at her over her book, but made no move to unlock the door. Stacy was crestfallen. Again, she had no choice.

"Woof woof" she said quietly. So quiet it was barely more than a stage whisper. She darted her eyes to the side, hoping the neighbors hadn't opened their car yet.

"What was that?" Amanda asked.

"Woof woof." Stacy said, this time at a normal volume. Her fear increased as she heard the car doors open and close. Her neighbors were out!

"I can't hear you..." Amanda said.

"WOOF WOOF!" Stacy yelled. Her face went beet red. Amanda reached up and unlocked the door, and Stacy flung herself through it the second it opened. She slammed the door just as the neighbors came to peek through the fence.

-----------

"I didn't know the Reynolds had a dog, did you sweetie?" Bob Moore asked.

"I didn't either. How nice for them" replied Nadine Moore. The two shook their heads and went inside.

-----------

What happens next?
11313222222.title: No choice, time's up, use a tree

choices: Stacy makes it to her room
113132222221.content:
Stacy was furious with Amanda for what had just happened. Now she was going to let her have it!

"That's it! You're finished you horrible woman! Grrrrrrrrrr!"

Stacy was so mad, she could barely speak. She didn't notice that her tirade had devolved into an animal-like growl. Amanda was a little worried, after all, Stacy looked like she was about to explode, but she couldn't help but laugh as the teenager gave into her animal instincts. She just had to get one last barb in at Stacy.

"Are you sure you're not all bark and no bite?" she teased.

"GRRRRRRRRR!" Stacy growled as she rushed at Amanda.

Stacy was so angry she didn't even know what she was going to do, her instincts just told her to attack. She wasn't thinking at all. Amanda saw the girl coming and waved a hand and said a word in a language Stacy didn't recognize. Stacy was only about a step away from Amanda, but suddenly she froze in mid-stride. The cloudiness in her mind from earlier came back with a vengeance. She stood before Amanda, trying to will her mind into gear. What had she been doing? She was sure there was something she was about to do or say. But for some reason, Stacy could not for the life of her think of what it was. Every time she tried, it was like her mind stopped working, and the harder she tried, the more her mind felt lost and stupid.

"Uhhhh, what was I saying?" Stacy asked, trying to cover her inability to figure out what was going on.

"You were just about to thank me for helping you with your bathroom issue." Amanda replied.

Was that right? Stacy tried to remember, but it's like her brain was responding to different signals. She remembered having to pee, but now she felt better, so she must have gone. Why did she have a problem? What was it? Stacy's brain would only give her fragments of what had happened. She remembered having to pee, but leaving the bathroom. Oh god! Then she remembered she had peed on a tree outside! And she had barked at the door to get back in! What was wrong with her?! Stacy's foggy brain did not remember Amanda tricking her out there, or forcing her to do any of that, all she could remember was actually doing it, and the missing details were filled in with the assumption that she had done that on her own.

"Oh, right, errr, thanks..." Stacy said, quickly ending the conversation.

She was so embarrassed that Amanda had seen her pee outside, she just wanted to get away. She turned and walked toward the hall.

"Aren't you forgetting something?" Amanda asked.

Stacy stopped. What was she forgetting? She couldn't think of anything. She turned and looked at Amanda, and her eyes widened in shock! Amanda was holding her jeans and panties! Stacy looked down at her waist. She was naked from the waist down! And worst of all, she had been so distracted, she didn't even notice! Her most private area was exposed for all to see! Now that she was aware, she couldn't help but feel a cool breeze blowing across her lower regions. Stacy bowed her head in shame and walked back to Amanda. She couldn't look her in the eyes as she took her pants back. She turned to run to her room, but heard Amanda speak.

"There you go, put your panties and pants on."

Again Stacy's mind was cloudy. Had Amanda said something? All Stacy wanted to do was run to her room, but now she thought 'I should put my pants back on.' She slowly stepped into her panties and pulled them up, then stepped into her jeans. Why hadn't she run to her bedroom to do that? For some reason, her brain had told her it was more important to put them on then to run away, even though that was her strongest desire at the moment. Now that she was done, she was ready to go hide in her room the rest of the night.

Stacy is about to rush off, but Amanda has another idea. Who wins?
113132222221.title: Stacy attacks Amanda

choices: Stacy makes it to school with no problem
Stacy finds a surprise waiting for her at breakfast
1131322222211.content:
"Watch tv with me" Amanda said to Stacy before she could leave the kitchen.

Stacy stopped walking with a glazed look on her face. Suddenly her thoughts of hiding in shame in her room were pushed to the back of her mind. Instead she felt the desire to watch tv with her babysitter.

"Okay, that sounds like fun" said Stacy, turning and heading for the living room. Amanda led the way and took a seat on the couch. Before Stacy could sit down next to her, Amanda said

"Sit."

Stacy immediately felt an intense desire to sit down. Even though she was right in front of the couch, instead of sitting on it, she lowered herself to the carpet and sat indian style. After a second, Stacy realized she was sitting on the carpet instead of the couch. She looked up at Amanda.

"Can I come sit next to you?" she asked. Stacy felt a little funny asking for something she would normally just do, but for some reason she felt she needed Amanda's permission. Amanda stretched her feet out and took up the whole couch.

"No, I need to stretch out. You're good where you are. You don't need to be up on the furniture."

Stacy considered this. She did feel fine where she was. Sure, there was only one person on the couch, and there were plenty of open chairs, but Stacy didn't need to be up on the furniture. This seat was fine. She settled with her back to the couch where Amanda was sitting and looked at the tv. Amanda turned on the tv, and eventually they settled in to watching a movie. After a while, Stacy started fidgeting. Her head was itching, but no matter what she did, it wouldn't stop. Amanda noticed, and kept quiet for a while, but finally spoke up.

"What's wrong Stacy? You seem like something's bothering you?" Amanda asked. Had Stacy looked behind, she would have seen a gleam in Amanda's eye.

"I don't know. My head keeps itching, but I can't get it to stop. It's really distracting."

"Would you like me to try? Maybe I can help?"

Stacy was a bit embarrassed to have Amanda touching her head, but the itching was so annoying that she reluctantly agreed. Amanda reached out and began scratching Stacy's head like she would a pet. As soon as Stacy felt Amanda's fingers going to work, the itching stopped.

"Thanks, that's much better" she said.

Amanda smiled and nodded. However, she didn't stop scratching Stacy's head. Stacy was a little uncomfortable with this, but only for a few seconds. Then Amanda's scratching started to feel like one of the best sensations Stacy had ever felt. She knew it was weird for her babysitter to be scratching her head like this, but it felt so good that Stacy couldn't bring herself to tell Amanda to stop. This kept up the whole rest of the movie. Stacy could barely pay attention, she was lost in the good feelings she was experiencing. She was so lost, Stacy was unaware that she had opened her mouth and barely stuck her tongue out, and was quietly panting.

At the end of the movie, Amanda stopped. Stacy woke up from her blissful fog, realizing she had missed most of the movie. She was about to ask Amanda what they should watch next, since it was only nine o'clock, but Amanda spoke first.

"Alright, you need to go to bed. It's your bedtime."

Stacy involuntarily yawned. She suddenly felt very tired. She looked at the clock and saw it was already 9:00. Wow, it's already my bedtime, she thought. I better get to bed. She stood up, yawning again.

"Good night Amanda, I'm going to bed."

"Good night Stacy" Amanda said with a smile.

Stacy walked upstairs to her room, changed into her pajamas, and crawled into bed. That night, she had the strangest dream. In her dream, she was somehow watching herself like she was in a movie. But the Stacy in her dream was acting funny. It was like she thought she was a dog. Stacy watched as dream-Stacy went to cheerleading practice and started sniffing all the other girls' butts. On the way home, she chased a squirrel into a tree. When she got home, the first thing she did was drink out of a toilet. As the dream ended, Stacy dreamed that dream-Stacy turned and looked at her, as though she could see her, and started barking at her!

Stacy awoke in a sweat. She couldn't remember what she had been dreaming, but for some reason she heard dog barking ringing in her ears. That only brought up the painfully embarrassing memory of how she herself had barked at the door yesterday. Stacy pushed that from her mind. Today was a new day, whatever strangeness happened yesterday was done. She got out of bed and headed for the shower.
1131322222211.title: Amanda says "Watch tv with me"

choices: Safe!  Stacy is out there alone
Oh no!  There is somebody else out there already
11313222222111.content:
Stacy exited the shower and headed back to her room. She put on her underwear and then her cheerleading uniform, then tied her shoulder length blonde hair back in a ponytail, grabbed her backpack, and walked downstairs. Amanda was in the kitchen when she got there.

"Good morning Stacy. All ready for school?"

"Just about, I'm just going to grab some juice and a pop tart."

"Okay. Have fun at school, but your mom said you're supposed to come home right after."

"I can't, I have cheer practice today. I'll be home after that."

Amanda nodded and handed Stacy a travel mug of orange juice. Stacy rolled her eyes behind Amanda's back. Just because she had a babysitter didn't mean she had to be treated like a baby. She grabbed her pop tart and headed out the door.

-------

School was going normal for Stacy. She saw her friends, caught a few boys checking her out in her cheerleading outfit, everything was good. Then fourth period happened. About half way through, Stacy felt the need to go to the bathroom. She asked for the hall pass and walked to the girl's bathroom. Once inside, it was like her brain had been replaced with cotton candy. Every thought took a monumental effort. She walked to the toilet, but like the other day, as soon as she looked at it, all she could think of was how thirsty she was. She went to the sink and filled her hands with water, drinking a few handfuls that way. Even though her thinking was muddled, she knew she didn't have much time in here before she got in trouble. And she knew she had to pee. But when she thought about peeing, all she could think about was peeing on a tree in her yard yesterday. If she tried to think about peeing in a toilet, her mind just spaced out and she completely lost her train of thought.

Stacy realized she didn't have time to fight her wonky brain. She had to pee, and she had to do it fast. She peeked her head outside the bathroom. Good, she thought, the halls are empty. She quickly walked down to the end of the hall. To her left, there was a door to the dumpsters out back behind the school. It was supposed to be locked, but she knew the janitors left it open so kids could sneak out and smoke. Stacy shook her head sadly. I'll bet they never thought of kids sneaking out for the reason I am, she thought to herself. She opened the door, hoping against hope no one was out there smoking now.

Was anyone out there?
11313222222111.title: Stacy makes it to school with no problem

choices: Stacy's soap and shampoo had been changed
Stacy notices a change in herself
113132222221111.content:
Stacy breathed a huge sigh of relief. She was the only out there. She couldn't even imagine what would have happened if there had been a smoker or anyone else out there to see her. Even though she was relieved, as her mind processed what she intended to do, she became incredibly embarrassed. But Stacy could think of no other way. She had to relieve herself now, and for some reason, whenever she tried to use a bathroom, she just got stupid. In the back of her mind, a nagging voice was starting to say 'Maybe that's because bathrooms aren't for you,' but it was very quiet for now.

Blushing a deep red, Stacy crept from the door to the grass behind the farthest dumpster. She took one more look around to make sure she was alone. Once she was convinced, she reached under her cheerleading skirt and pulled her panties off. Then she held her legs apart and squatted over the grass and let her muscles go. Almost immediately, she began peeing. Stacy was battling conflicting feelings. She felt deeply ashamed that here she was, peeing in the grass behind the school, but at the same time, she couldn't deny the relief she felt at taking care of her business. She had never noticed feeling relief at peeing before, it had just been something she did. But now it actually felt good to pee. After she was done, she quickly waddled away from where she had been. Again, she hadn't thought to bring toilet paper, so she squatted in some dry grass and padded herself off, then put her underwear back on. As she was standing up, she couldn't help but look at what she had done.

In the grass next to the dumpster was a decent sized yellow puddle. Some of it had already been soaked into the ground, but she had peed enough that there was no chance all of that would happen for a while. Although she was embarrassed by what she had done, there was a small part of her that felt differently. Her gaze lingered a second longer. Was that pride she felt? Ugh, what do I have to be proud of? I just peed in the grass like an animal. Yeah, the small part of her brain thought, but boy oh boy did I mark that territory. Anybody who goes out there to smoke will know that Stacy has been here! A small trace of a grin formed on Stacy's lips.

She shook her head. What was wrong with her. This was nothing to be proud of. She quickly walked back to the door and crept inside. No one was around. It looks like Stacy was in the clear. She returned to class and handed back the hall pass. The teacher eyed her questioningly, although probably only because she had taken a bit long. Stacy just blushed and went back to her seat. If only the teacher knew the half of it!

---------------

The rest of school went fine. Stacy studiously did not think about her bathroom adventure. After school, she got with her friends and went to cheer practice. There was a rough moment early on. Stacy and the other girls started stretching. Stacy looked at her friend Nikki, who was bending over to stretch. Her mind flashed back to her dream. Her mind showed her a glimpse of her walking over and sticking her face into Nikki's exposed butt and taking a big sniff. Stacy practically gagged. She shook her head to get rid of the thought. Nikki looked over at her.

"You alright there Stacy?" she asked.

"Yeah... uhhhh... fine... everything's good."

Nikki mouthed 'whatever' and went back to stretching. Stacy made sure not to look at any one in particular and just focus on her stretching. The rest of practice went by without any issues. The girls practiced a lot of new routines, and worked up quite a sweat. When they were done, everyone noticed there was a slightly different odor in the air.

"Girls, I shouldn't have to remind you, you need to wash your uniforms after every practice."

Stacy rolled her eyes. Of course, everyone knew that. She grabbed her bag, said goodbye to Nikki, and got in her car. When she got back, she opened the front door and went inside. She saw Amanda sitting on the couch as she went in.

"Hi Stacy. You're just in time. Dinner's in 15 minutes."

"Okay, I'm just going to take a quick show and I'll be down" Stacy said. She headed upstairs for the bathroom.

Amanda smiled to herself. It wasn't too noticeable yet, unless you were paying attention. But if you were, you might have wondered why the sweaty teenage girl who just walked by had the unmistakable odor of dog wafting off her.

As Stacy stepped into her show, she noticed something was different.
113132222221111.title: Safe!  Stacy is out there alone

choices: Stacy gets a phonecall from a friend
1131322222211111.content:
Stacy climbed in the shower and turned on a nice hot spray. She was worn out from cheerleading, and the warm water felt great. After standing under the water relaxing for a few minutes, she reached for her shampoo. Normally she didn't even look at it, but for some reason the bottle felt weird. She opened her eyes and noticed it was a different bottle than she usually had. Instead of the green herbal essences bottle, she had some strange purple bottle. And whenever she tried to read the label, her mind fogged up and she got distracted. God, what was wrong with her these days? Stacy just shrugged and poured a liberal dollop of the shampoo into her hands, then proceeded to lather down her hair. Had Stacy actually read the bottle, she might not have been so quick to touch it to her hair. The purple bottle had a bone shaped lid, and said 'Pet Head 2-in-1 Dog Shampoo and Conditioner.' Her body wash had also been replaced with a bargain pet soap, but this also escaped Stacy's notice.

Stacy did notice her shampoo smelled different, but with her cloudy mind she just figured she had bought a new bottle and not noticed it was different. After rinsing her hair, she proceeded to wash herself with the pet soap, again noticing a different smell, but being unable to do anything more than notice it. She took an extra minute or two to relax in the water, then rinsed off, turned off the water, and dried off. She dressed in a normal pair of panties and a bra, then put on a pink tshirt, a pair of jeans, and headed downstairs for dinner. Stacy didn't notice, but the dog shampoo had left her hair a little frizzier than usual.

Stacy walked into the kitchen to see Amanda pouring a glass of water from the fridge. On the table was a plate of spaghetti and salad. Stacy walked toward the chair.

"Uh uh, that's my dinner" Amanda said.

"Where's mine?" Stacy asked.

Amanda pointed to the floor. To Stacy's dismay, on the floor was the same bowl with her name on it. And the bowl was once again filled with wet dog food.

"Oh no... not again..." Stacy muttered. She could feel her mind clouding up.

"I'll tell you what Stacy. I'll let you pick what you want to eat tonight. Eat whichever seems the best to you."

Amanda watched Stacy thoughtfully. She wondered how this would turn out. She could see the teen was confused, but also trying to work something out in her head. Stacy, meanwhile, felt conflicted. For some reason, she could tell this decision was very important. She really wanted to eat the spaghetti and salad. But every time she looked at it, it just did not look appealing. She reluctantly looked over at the dog food. For some reason, it looked good. And the smell! The smell was heavenly. Stacy was so lost in her senses, she didn't realize that she was staring at the dog food intently with her mouth hanging open. She even started to drool! Stacy turned back to the spaghetti and tried to force herself to sit down in front of it, but her body wouldn't listen. Instead she felt her stomach growl. Without conscious effort, Stacy's needs took over, and she found herself kneeling down in front of the dog food. Her mind tried to rally one last time, pointing out that she wasn't a dog and shouldn't be eating what dogs eat, but her stomach rebelled with another hunger pang. She heard a quiet splattering of liquid on the floor, and to her amazement realized she had been drooling so much it was running down her chin and onto the floor. Her shock at that realization lowered her mental defenses, and her body took over, plunging her mouth into the waiting bowl of dog food.

Amanda smiled and sat down at the table. She enjoyed her dinner while watching Stacy go to town on her bowl of dog food. She was pleased to see how far Stacy's animal instincts were progressing. She chuckled as she saw just how messy Stacy was eating, this time the teen got even more of the food on her face and chin, and it mixed in with her own drool. To further confuse Stacy's mind, Amanda held a conversation with her, asking her how her day went, things like that. Stacy responded like she would to any dinner chit-chat, the difference being that in between talking she was taking large face-first bites of dog food. Stacy's cloudy mind knew she should be embarrassed of eating dog food like this, but she also felt like it was normal to talk and eat, so she did. Once finished, Stacy wanted to run away in shame.

"Stacy, clean up the dishes." Amanda commanded.

Despite her desire to go away, Stacy found herself complying. She took Amanda's plates and her bowl to the sink and washed them. All the while she was doing this, her face was smeared with dog food. It was on her chin, her cheeks, her lips, even the tip of her nose. A bit of her blonde hair had fallen in the way while she was eating, so there was even a bit of food stuck in her hair. After cleaning, she went to the bathroom to wash away her shame, but she didn't notice Amanda follow her.

Stacy looked at herself in the mirror despondently. Her face was a mess. She wanted to wash it off and drink about five bottle of mouthwash to get the taste of dog food out of her mouth. But before she could do so, Amanda popped her head in and said,

"Stacy, come downstairs, it's tv time."

Stacy immediately felt the overpowering desire to go downstairs and watch tv. She turned and left the bathroom, face and hair still messy with dog food. Again, Amanda made Stacy sit on the floor in front of her, and she began scratching her head again. Stacy zoned out again, panting at the pleasant feelings. Although they were slightly less pleasant this time with the pungent taste of dog food festering in her mouth. After an hour, she felt a rumbling in her stomach.

"Oooohhhhh..." Stacy moaned.

"What's wrong girl?" asked Amanda.

"I have to go to the bathroom."

"Okay, we can take a pee break."

"No, I have to go."

"Oh, I see. Come with me."

Amanda stood up and held out her hand. Stacy felt compelled to take it. She stood up and reached for Amanda with her right hand. Amanda led Stacy through the living room toward the sliding glass door to the back yard. Stacy realized where they were heading and wanted to run away, but her brain refused to listen. Instead, it forced her to follow where Amanda was taking her. Amanda walked over and opened the door. It was dark out, so it was unlikely there would be any neighbors outside.

"Pants. Hand them over. Underwear too."

Stacy bowed her head to avoid meeting Amanda's eyes as she reluctantly stripped her pants and panties and handed them to her babysitter. She knew this was bizarre and wrong for a teenage girl to be giving her pants to her adult babysitter, but she couldn't stop herself. Amanda pointed out to the yard.

"Go out there and do your business. Bark when you're ready to be let back in."

Stacy dejectedly went outside. She knew what was coming, and although it was awful, she had begun to realize that whatever was going on, she couldn't fight it. Stacy walked out behind a tree (not the same one as before, she wasn't ready for that yet) and squatted down. This time it didn't just come, she had to actually work her muscles, but finally she managed to poop on the grass. She realized she also needed to pee, so she went ahead and did that. After she was done, she cursed herself for not thinking of toilet paper. She patter herself off, but knew she wasn't clean. At this point, as much as she didn't want to admit it, Stacy was beginning to associate doing her business with being outside. When she thought of peeing, she thought of the sights and smells of grass and the outdoors, not the image of toilets or bathrooms. She didn't realize it, but her mind was already losing her memories of sitting on a toilet. Squatting was what her mind remembered.

Stacy walked back to the door, but was worried when Amanda wasn't there. Maybe she was just waiting for her final humiliation. Stacy knew being quiet wouldn't do her any good, so why bother?

"Woof woof!" Stacy yelled.

A second later, Amanda walked back into the living room and opened the door. She had a roll of toilet paper in her hand. She took a step outside.

"Stand still and bend over" she told Stacy.

Stacy did as Amanda said. Then she endured a new humiliation as Amanda wiped her bottom clean with toilet paper, which she then put in a trash bag. Stacy was still bent over as Amanda walked over to the tree and used some paper to pick up Stacy's mess and put it in the bag, then tie it off and put it in the garbage. Finally Amanda walked back inside.

"You can come in now girl" she said.

What next?
1131322222211111.title: Stacy's soap and shampoo had been changed

choices: That night, Stacy dreams she is a dog
The next morning, Stacy wakes up to a surprise
11313222222111111.content:
As soon as Stacy walked in the door, the phone rang. She looked at it and saw it was her friend Nikki.

"Hey Nikki, what's up?"

Stacy started talking to her friend. When Stacy talked on the phone, she liked to walk around at the same time. So naturally, Stacy started pacing throughout the house while talking to Nikki. Amanda laughed to herself. What Stacy had failed to notice was that she hadn't put her pants back on. Her brain was losing the ability to focus on human things, just as Amanda has hoped. Meanwhile, Stacy chatted with her friend, completely oblivious to the fact she was naked from the waist down.

After about an hour on the phone, Stacy and Nikki finished talking. She was just starting to realize something was odd when Amanda walked into her room.

"Bedtime girl" Amanda said.

Stacy looked at the clock. That's weird, she thought. For some reason, the numbers were all blurry. She figured the clock was broken. In reality, it was working fine, displaying 9:10 for everyone to read. It was Stacy who was the problem, she didn't know it but she was beginning to lose her ability to read. Even though Stacy would never go to bed at 9 on a Friday night, she found herself agreeing with Amanda.

Stacy walked into her bathroom and was distraught with her reflection in the mirror. Her face was smeared with dog food, some was even caught in her hair. And worst of all, she finally realized she wasn't wearing any pants! She tried to become angry about it, but her mind was fuzzy. It was so fuzzy that when Amanda came in with a wet washcloth, Stacy just let her wipe her face for her without any resistance. Amanda handed Stacy her pj's and left the bathroom. Stacy changed, grateful to be fully clothed again. But to her dismay her pj's seemed itchier than usual.

She put that from her mind when she realized how thirsty she was. Gosh, all that talking had left her parched. She thought about how great some nice cold water would feel. Her mind was so fuzzy that while she was thinking how good water sounded, she didn't even notice her body moving on its own. Her body walked over and knelt down in front of the toilet. Stacy came to in time to experience herself diving headfirst into the toilet bowl. She was confused, but her thirst took over, and Stacy began drinking. It was difficult, but with a little experimentation Stacy found herself able to take on water pretty well. Once she had drank her fill, she stood up and gasped. What had she done! She just drank from the toilet! Gross!

Stacy buried her face in her towel. Her face had gotten soaked from trying to drink out of the toilet, and she wanted to wipe away any evidence of that shameful deed. But for some reason, even though she knew it was wrong, she found it hard to concentrate on what she had just done. Her mind was so cloudy that thinking was just too much effort for the poor girl. After drying off, she decided to brush her teeth and get to bed to end the humiliation of the day.

But as Stacy looked around, she couldn't find her toothbrush or toothpaste. Had Amanda taken it? She walked down to the kitchen, where Amanda was putting something in a cabinet.

"Amanda, did you do something to my toothbrush?"

"Of course not. You must have lost it. You're always losing things."

"I am?" Stacy asked confused. She didn't think she lost a lot of things, but it was so hard to remember. Maybe Amanda was right.

"Don't worry. Here, this is better for your teeth. Eat this."

Amanda handed Stacy a cookie. It was brown and bone shaped. Stacy couldn't tell, but printed on it was the world 'Milkbone.' Stacy knew eating cookies wasn't a great substitute for brushing her teeth, but she felt compelled to do what Amanda said. So she popped it in her mouth and chewed it up. It tasted strange, but not bad.

"Okay, off to bed with you. You're so tired you can barely make it."

Stacy yawned. She was exhausted. She walked up to her bedroom and just fell onto her bed.
11313222222111111.title: Stacy gets a phonecall from a friend

113132222221111112.content:
The next morning, Stacy awoke early on. Usually on the weekends, Stacy would sleep often till almost noon, but for some reason she felt wide awake by 7. A good night's sleep had done wonders for her mood. She pulled back the covers and sat up in bed. She felt like today she could get her life back on track. Stacy reached down and scratched her legs. Her pj's consisted of a sleeveless top and shorts, but for some reason her legs itched as though they were covered in scratchy fabric.

As her fingers reached her legs, she gasped. Her legs felt different. She was afraid to look, but couldn't help herself. She glanced down and was horrified to see her legs were covered in a coating of light blonde hair! It looked as though Stacy hadn't shaved her legs in six months! How could this have happened? The hair seemed to be covering her whole legs, both upper and lower. She had never had this much hair on her upper legs in her life. But that wasn't the only thing she noticed. Her toenails had grown and become much more sharp over the night. Her fingernails as well. They almost resembled claws.

Stacy started freaking out, but she also felt the familiar cloudiness coming over her mind. She struggled to get out of bed and get to the bathroom to shave and cut her nails. But as she opened her bedroom door, Amanda was standing outside smiling.

"Good morning Stacy!" she said cheerily.

"Umm.... morning.... need to go to the bathroom... " Stacy mumbled, trying to get by.

"You need to pee? The lets go outside girl."

Amanda took Stacy by the hand and led her downstairs. Inside, Stacy tried to resist, but she couldn't. Amanda led her downstairs and out to the yard, then pointed to a tree and told her to go pee. Stacy walked over to the tree, pulled her shorts and panties off, and squatted down and relieved herself. At this point, Stacy didn't even feel the situation was all that strange. She had to pee, there was an open tree over there, why not take care of herself? Once she was done, she walked back to Amanda.

"I need to take a shower" Stacy said. She started to walk to the stairs.

"No time for that Stacy. It's time for your exercise." Amanda said.

Stacy stopped and thought. Exercise? What exercise? She often went for a jog on weekdays, but Stacy wasn't a huge exercise girl. But now she felt like maybe she should be. Stacy looked at Amanda and realized she had been holding some clothes, which she handed to Stacy.

"Here, put these on. Then go to the living room and start exercising. I want you to do 100 pushups, 100 situps, and jog in place for 30 minutes."

Stacy nodded and took the clothes. They were a pair of running pants and a sports bra. Stacy had already taken off her shorts, so she pulled off her top and put on the sports bra, then put her panties back on, followed by the running pants. Although she still really wanted to shave, she was at least happy to have something covering her legs. Had Amanda not even noticed her hair? Why hadn't she said anything?

These thoughts were on her mind as she began her instructed routine. Stacy mainly just jogged and did whatever exercises they did at cheerleading, so doing pushups and situps on her own was not normal. As she did, she found this was quite a workout. She started working up quite a sweat as she did what Amanda told her. By the time she had finished the pushups and situps, she was breathing very heavy and covered in a sheen of sweat. While doing her jogging, she didn't realize, but she was panting the entire time with her tongue out.

When she was done, she was exhausted. She was covered in sweat, her hair sticky with it. To her great shame, she stank something awful. And not just the normal smell of a sweaty person. No, she definitely stank like a dog would. She couldn't understand why, but anytime she tried to think on it, her mind just fogged over. She was pulled by her thoughts by the sound of the can opener. She walked over to the kitchen in time to see Amanda empty a can of dog food into a bowl. Stacy's stomach growled as soon as she saw it. Amanda placed the bowl on the floor and Stacy dove in, scarfing down the food.

After finishing up, Stacy realized just how awful she must look. She was still sweaty and stank of dog, and she was sure her face was smeared with food. The taste of it was all over her mouth. Amanda wiped her face off with a washcloth, then, before Stacy could go upstairs to shower, told her it was time they go out.

Where would Amanda take Stacy?

1131322222211112.content:
Standing in her shower, Stacy noticed the hair around her groin was much thicker than usual, almost like fur, and it was a golden hue. "Do I need to start shav... Wha?!" At the same time, as she ran her hand down to examine the fur, her hand hit a bump. Feeling around, she found five more bumps like this one, and they felt like... "Nipples?!" Stacy stumbled from the shock, bumping her rear, and something else, into the shower wall. Stacy looked back and saw a three foot long dog tail covered in the same golden fur as her groin. Seeing the tail seemed to break whatever power that happened to be blocking Stacy's memory and altering her mind, because a very human sense of panic and rage filled Stacy as the gaps where her mind went foggy were filled back in and she was allowed to think on them with her full human cognitive functions. "I wanted so bad to attack Amanda after... she tricked me into peeing outside!! Then my mind went blank!! Now that I think of it..." She thought about how she got thirsty looking at the toilet, wanted to pee on trees, and how she mistook dog food for meatloaf. She thought back on the first things Amanda said, including the weird words she didn't quite get before. Amongst those words Stacy heard her name uttered. That was when she put two and two together. "Man I love my ability to recall things!! The bitch cast a spell on me!!" Stacy stood defiantly in the shower, tail wagging away. "Okay, definitely different." She utters about her tail.

It was then she realized just when she grew the tail. She had felt a mild discomfort on the base of her spine during practice, but whenever she thought on it, her brain went on auto-pilot like it did with the toilet. Then, during the last routine they practice they did, she did a split, and during it a quiet split only she heard came from under her uniform's skirt, followed by a relief in the spinal pain. She apparently never noticed it before because she was so tired after practice she just wore her uniform home, and the skirt cleverly hid it from view.

Stacy stepped out of the shower, thinking of the words Amanda said. Quietly, she recited them back to herself, certain to not utter her name, just in case saying it with her name could make this worse. "Morofs Nart ______, Morphos al Canis Familiaris." She scratched her head, then said, "The first part sounds like 'transform' backwards, then the name of the target, followed by a word that sounds like 'morph,' then 'canis familiaris,' which I think means dog. See, Mr. Harmon, I wasn't ALWAYS asleep in biology class..." Stacy felt a need to pee, and that's when she decided to enact a scheme for revenge.

"I need to pee!!" Amanda hears the now common cries, and Amanda nabs a collar and leash, ready to further her scheme. "Maybe I can get her to go on a walk..." She walks upstairs to see Stacy, on the toilet, taking a whizz like a person. "Wha..."

11332112.content:
Stacy thought Amanda was playing with her, and Stacy had no intention of drinking from a bowl. But the irritation in her throat was too much. Stacy got down on her hands and knees and started to lap up the water like a dog.

A tingling sensation touched her ears. She lifted a hand and touched her ears, the right, then the left, feeling that they had become more pointed, with a light coating of fuzz now covering them.

The fur poked through her skin along the sides of her face and neck, a brushing feeling that was almost…pleasant. A slight sting entered her eyes, very briefly, as the fur started to cover her face. A black smudge touched her nose. She wondered where the smudge could have come from. No, Stacy thought frantically, her nose itself was turning black! Cracks and jolts rocked her face as her mouth pushed outward into a dog’s muzzle, quickly becoming covered in soft golden fur. Her teeth sharpened, into fangs, as her tongue lengthened further and further out with her muzzle. The human hair she had began to fall out, falling gradually to the floor, to be replaced by the same fur that was invading the rest of her head.

Once again Stacy tried to speak, only to realize her vocal chords were changing.

" Ngghhh, Grrrrfff."

Stacy moved a hand -a paw - up? They weren’t hands, Stacy thought desperately. Not anymore. Her hands, paws, had changed, her fingers shortened and her thumbs now a long way up her wrist, with short black claws protruding out. Leathery pads had developed on her palms. My-help me! She tried to call out, but could only make a high-pitched whine. Stacy slashed her right paw down her shirt, ripping the buttons apart, tearing the garment off her body. She was horrified to find thick golden fur covering almost all of her chest and back.

Pressure built up at the base of her spine, an uncomfortable pulling sensation. No, not that, she thought urgently, not a tail! She fell to the floor, crawling hysterically out of her jeans as the pressure of her changing hips and legs became too much to bear, using her newly formed forepaws to drag herself along. She watched, panting, as her new tail grew at an astonishing rate, snaking out until it lay on her backside. God, she could feel the thing sitting there. Embarrassment flushed her mind as the fur grew across her hips. Bone cracked across her legs as they became thinner, differently jointed, suited to the rest of her body. Her feet cricked and Stacy was pushed up on to her toes, on to all fours like the animal she knew she was becoming. Leathery pads invaded the bottom of her altering feet, while fur grew on the few patches of skin that still remained bare. Stacy tried to stand, strained to get up, but clumsily fell back on to her four legs.

A plethora of new smells started to invade her canine nose. The sounds outside became crisper, clearer, the birds around her parent’s home now seeming much closer than they ever had before.

Then the changes stopped. Stacy looked over her golden-furred body, at her tail, her four paws, at her black nose, which was always in her vision. A golden retriever. That was what she was. Not human anymore, not physically at least.
