They all began to change in different ways
135312121.content:
Stacy woke up with a start.What the - ? Where am I?


She looked around in alarm. She appeared to be resting on a hay bale in a huge barn. She also appeared to be stark naked!

"What the ***?", She turned around at the sound of Belinda's voice. Her four friends were also in the barn, and also stark naked.

"Where are we?", said Astrid.

"It looks like a barn of some kind", said Anna. "But how did we get here? We all feel asleep like that. Were we drugged?"

"I don't feel like I was drugged", said Stacy. "When I had anesthesia for my hernia operation, I should felt it afterwards. I actually feel pretty good - at least, physically."

"Do any of you feel like you've been. interfered with, if you know what I mean?", asked Belinda, pointedly.

The girls all replied in the negative.

"I'm starving", said Anna. "I wonder how long we were out for?"

"I'm hungry, too", said Janet. "Maybe we could eat some of that stuff."

The other four girls whirled and looked. There was a very large table, filed high with an astonishing variety of green leafy vegetables. The quintet walked over to the table as one, and stared at the food, as though hypnotized. As if at a signal, they began devouring the food in a frenzy, stuffing themselves until every last scrap of it was gone.

"Oh, my God", said Stacy, afterwards. "I can't believe we ate all of that stuff! What got into us? We were like sharks in a feeding frenzy!"

"I don't believe it", said Belinda. "It should not have been physically possible for us to have eaten all of that stuff. We should all be ready to puke by now. Instead, I just feel comfortably full."

"We should try to figure out where we are", said Janet. "Let's search this barn."

Even as they set out to search the barn, their bodies began to change.

How did they change?
135312121.title: Slow-but-steady

1353121212.content:
The five girls set out to search the barn. It was larger than any barn Stacy had ever seen. There was a stairway up to what looked like a loft. She went up and looked around, but didn't find anything, except more hay.

You'd think there'd be something, she thought. Her nose felt itchy,and when she went to scratch it, she realized that it felt odd - swollen, distended. It didn't hurt at all, but it was definitely not normal. Some sort of reaction to that food, maybe?


She finished her search, and went back down the ladder. The others were gathered together.

"So, you, too", said Belinda. It took a minute for Stacy to realize what she meant, but she soon figured it out.

Two of Janet's incisors were sticking out from under her upper lip, perpendicular to her other teeth. Anna's ears were twice their normal size, and flaps of skin appeared to be extending from them. Belinda heel were oddly swollen, forcing her up on to her toes, which appeared to be receding into her feet. Additionally, the skin of her feet appeared to turning wrinkly. Nothing seemed to be wrong with Astrid, until she turned around and showed Stacy that there was the beginning of what looked like a tail with a tuft of hair on it, projecting from her backside.

"Guys, what the Hell is happening to use?", said Astrid. "I'm really scared!"

"I don't blame you", said Anna. "Where are we? Who - or what - is doing this to us? Do our families even know that something has happened to us?"

"I was wondering if there was something in those veggies we ate". said Stacy.

"Maybe" said Belinda. "But whatever the case, we need to find out what's going on, and fast. There's nothing in this barn but hay. I think we should
get out of here and figure out where we are."


"I'm not wild about the idea of wandering around outside naked", said Astrid.

"I think that's the least of our worries right now", said Belinda.

"Yeah", said Anna. "On the other hand,whoever left that food here might come back at some point to check on us. We could try getting answers from them."

"If we could get answers from them", replied Belinda.

The girls talked about it for a while, and decided to...
1353121212.title: They all began to change in different ways

135312121211.content:
Eventually, they decided to explore the world outside the barn.

"Maybe some of us should stay here, in case someone comes". said Astrid.

"Nah, we'd better all stay together", said Belinda,

And so they all set out. The world outside was extensive grassland, dotted with small trees here and there. They occasionally passed small ponds, filled with clear water. It appeared to be late morning, and the air was cool and pleasant.

Stacy said to Belinda, "Does it hurt, walking with your feet like that?"

"It's just weird, not uncomfortable. It's a bit like walking on two big gel packs."

As they walked along, Stacy realized that her nose had gotten bigger, it now hung down below her chin. She found that she could move it around.

It's getting to be like an elephant's trunk, she thought. She looked at her friends. Anna's ears now had big flaps over them. Astrid now had a full-fledged gray-skinned tail. Janet's teeth were projecting outward like two little tusks, and Belinda's feet were now oval-shaped and flat-bottomed. Her toes were gone, leaving only three toenails behind. Her legs up to her knees were covered with wrinkly gray skin.

"Oh, my God", she said. "This is gonna sound crazy, but I think we're being turned into elephants by my babysitter."

"You're right, it does sound crazy", said Anna. "But maybe not as crazy as it might have sounded yesterday. Why your babysitter?"

"She said she worked with elephants", replied Stacy. "Trying to increase their population."

"So, she's increasing the elephant population by turning us into elephants? Why would she do that?"

"Perhaps I could field that one", said a voice from behind them, They spun around and saw that it was...
135312121211.title: To explore outside the barn

choices: "I'm finding a way out of here", said Belinda.
"Maybe we should just accept it", said Astrid.
1353121212111.content:
"Amanda!", said Stacy. "So it was you! But why?"

"First off, let me tell you who I really am." Amanda shimmered, and changed, becoming the most beautiful sixteen year-old girl Stacy they had ever seen. Stacy - who liked boys just fine, thank you - still found the girl alluring. If anyone could ever make me switch teams, it would be her, she thought. Anna, Astrid and Belinda seemed to be similarly affected. Janet - who did not like boys - looked like she'd been hit by a baseball bat. She moaned softly, and - was she? Yes, she was actually drooling just a tiny bit.

If we get out of this. we really need to find her a girl friend, thought Stacy. I wonder if there are lesbian elephants?

"I've had many names", said Amanda. "But my first name was 'Ahn-Zuu'. It meant 'Little Rabbit' in a language that was forgotten a thousand years before the Sphinx was built. Yes, I am older than the current civilization. I am what you would call a 'sorceress'. A long time ago, I entered the service of a powerful being who has also had many names. You know her as 'Mother Nature'."

"Mother Nature is real?", said Belinda.

"Yes", said Ahn-Zuu, "And she's not to happy with the human race these days. So many of her animals are going extinct, and humans are the cause. So, she's using humans to solve the problems humans to rescue the animals that humans are destroying."

"What does that mean?' asked Stacy.

Ahn-Zuu waved her arm, as if pointing at the landscape around them. "This place is a sort of 'cosmic nature preserve' in what you would call 'another dimension', a place specifically designed to be a paradise for elephants, and a few other animals, as well. Here, you, and others like you, will create a population of elephants, safe from predators and hunters. You'll retain your human intelligence and personalities, but will be otherwise compelled to live as normal elephants."

"Why us?", asked Anna. "I get it that humans have been bad, but we haven't extincted any animals personally. Why are we being punished?"

"You misunderstand", said Ahn-Zuu. "Being turned into elephants isn't a punishment, it's a privilege."

"A privilege?", said Belinda.

"Oh, yes", said Ahn-Zuu. "You don't want to know what she does to to poachers and polluters. I wish I didn't." She shook her head, as if to clear away a bad memory. "If you knew what 's going to be happening on Earth over the next century, you might just be very happy to live here as elephants."

"But why us particularly?", asked Belinda.

"No special reason. You're all basically decent girls. I saw Stacy heading in a bad direction, I decided to save her from that. You were just easy to gather, being her closest friends."

"Thanks so much for inviting me over, Stacy", said Anna.

"Don't blame her", said Ahn-Zuu. "I would've gotten you some other way if she hadn't."

"'A bad direction'?", said Stacy.

"Yeah, you would've been dead by thirty", said Ahn-Zuu.

"What.", said Stacy.

"Does it have to be us?", said Janet.

"Yeah, couldn't it be someone else?", said Astrid.

"Yeah", said Anna. "Listen, get us out of this, we'll do whatever it takes to stop people hunting elephants, I swear we will."

"I'm sorry, girls, but that was decided above my pay grade, as you would say."

"But what about our families?", asked Stacy.

"i'm afraid that for them, you'll just have disappeared one day. I'm afraid that Mother Nature isn't always gentle."

"Say, what does she do for endangered predators?", asked Belinda.

"Provides them a place like this, with plenty of prey animals."

"Isn't that hard on the prey animals?'

"It's natural for predators to hunt prey. It's what humans do to animals that is unnatural."

"Wait, 'dead by thirty'?", said Stacy.

"I'm not accepting it", said Belinda. "I will find a way out of here, Mother Nature of not."

"Child, if you can find a way out of here, I will let you go. and take that from my boss, myself. But I should warn you, I myself couldn't get in and out of here without her permission. Anyway, I've got to go now. You've got mating season coming up in a month, so I've got to recruit for boys to turn into suitable mates for you. Hmm. It's about feeding time for you."

She gestured, and another table laden with greens appeared in front of them,

"Bye", she said, and vanished.

"'Mating season'?", said Janet.

"Dead by thirty'?", said Stacy.

Unable to resist the food, the girls fell on it, and devoured it until it was all gone.When they were done, Stacy's trunk reached halfway down her chest, Janet's tusks were much longer, and Anna's ears were now completely elephantine, as were Belinda's legs. The skin on Astrid's butt was gray and wrinkly, and the change was beginning spread down her legs. Stacy,Janet and Anna's heads were getting so heavy that they found it harder and harder to stand up straight.

"So, what now?", said Anna.
1353121212111.title: Amanda

"How do you think we can stop it?", asked Anna,

"I don't know", said Belinda. "But I think we need to explore this place some more. Here's what I think we should do. Astrid - I know you don't like the idea of wandering around outside naked by yourself, so you stay here in case Ahn-Zuu or anyone else shows up. The other four of us will each take a direction, and go about a mile or so, and see what we can find. Don't go too far. if you think you might not be able to find your way back to the barn if you go any further, then turn around and come back. We don't want anyone getting lost. Keep your eyes open, and see whatever you can see. Agreed?"

The others consented, and Stacy, Anna, Janet and Belinda set out.
